general.description: Seafile. Organize files into libraries. Each library can be shared between users and into groups. A library can also be selectively synced into any device. now!
general.help:
This module offers you the way to store your important documents like invoices and orders in a remote seafile account.
In order to setup the module, you need:

  • Seafile Account Credentials
  • Set the Invoices destination path
  • Set the Order destination path

In order to send an invoice or order document, you need to click on the Seafile button in the order admin detail page or on the invoice admin detail page.

field.label: Server Endpoint
field.description: Set your server endpoint url. For instance: https://cloud.seafile.com/ or https://seafile.yourdomain.com/

field.label: Repo Id
field.description: Set your repository ID. You can get it or create it from the web interface of the Seafile service. Click on My Library and look at the URL. The Repository ID is like a12368a-f442-123c-a145-06bf84c1fabc/

field.label: Seafile: Invoices destination path
field.description: Destination path where the invoices files will be saved. Placeholders: {year} {month} {monthname} {quarter} - eg: /documents/{year}/Invoices/{quarter}/{monthname}/

field.label: Seafile: Orders destination path
field.description: Destination path where the orders files will be saved. Placeholders: {year} {month} {monthname} {quarter} - eg: /documents/{year}/Orders/{quarter}/{monthname}/
